edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.SnakeActiveContour.SnakeActiveContour ( LatLonGrid  gradient  )  

00037                                                   {
00038         // Normalize the gradient grid to lie between 0 and 100
00039         this.gradient = LatLonGrid.copyOf(gradient);
00040         int maxgradient = 0;
00041         for (int i=0; i < gradient.getNumLat(); ++i) for (int j=0; j < gradient.getNumLon(); ++j){
00042             if ( gradient.getValue(i, j) > maxgradient ){
00043                 maxgradient = gradient.getValue(i, j);
00044             }
00045         }
00046         for (int i=0; i < gradient.getNumLat(); ++i) for (int j=0; j < gradient.getNumLon(); ++j){
00047             if ( gradient.getValue(i, j) != gradient.getMissing() ){
00048                 this.gradient.setValue(i, j, (gradient.getValue(i, j) * GRADIENT_SCALE) / maxgradient);
00049             } else {
00050                 this.gradient.setValue(i, j, 0);
00051             }
00052         }   
00053     }

00351                                                             {
00352         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("snake");
00353         
00354         // data
00355         LatLonGrid grid = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LinearScaling()).crop(1000, 2100, 100, 200);
00356         KmlWriter.write(grid, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00357         
00358         // find cities > 10 px and more than 20,000 residents/km^2
00359         int thresh = 20;
00360         Segmenter seg = new HysteresisSegmenter(thresh, thresh-5);
00361         LabelResult labelResult = seg.label(grid);
00362         KmlWriter.write(labelResult.label, out, "allcities_"+thresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00363         int sizethresh = 10;
00364         LabelResult pruned = RegionProperty.pruneBySize(labelResult, grid, sizethresh);
00365         RegionProperty[] prop = RegionProperty.compute(pruned, grid);
00366         KmlWriter.write(pruned.label, out, "largecities_"+sizethresh, PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00367         
00368         // threshold image and compute gradient of thresholded image
00369         LatLonGrid binaryImage = new SimpleThresholder(1).threshold(pruned.label);
00370         binaryImage = new DilationFilter(1).filter(binaryImage);
00371         KmlWriter.write(binaryImage, out, "thresh", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00372         LatLonGrid gradient = new LoGEdgeFilter(2,1).edgeFilter(binaryImage);
00373         KmlWriter.write(gradient, out, "gradient", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00374                 
00375         // for each city, initialize a snake
00376         SnakeActiveContour alg = new SnakeActiveContour(gradient);
00377         int numiter = 30;
00378         for (int i=1; i < prop.length; ++i){
00379             double cx = prop[i].getCx();
00380             double cy = prop[i].getCy();
00381             // square box enclosing the center point that is larger than core area
00382             double initsize = 3 * Math.sqrt( prop[i].getSize() );
00383             SnakeNode[] snakepts = new SnakeNode[4];
00384             snakepts[0] = new SnakeNode(cx + initsize, cy - initsize, grid.getNumLat(), grid.getNumLon() );
00385             snakepts[1] = new SnakeNode(cx + initsize, cy + initsize, grid.getNumLat(), grid.getNumLon() );
00386             snakepts[2] = new SnakeNode(cx - initsize, cy + initsize, grid.getNumLat(), grid.getNumLon() );
00387             snakepts[3] = new SnakeNode(cx - initsize, cy - initsize, grid.getNumLat(), grid.getNumLon() );
00388     
00389             SnakeNode[] snake = alg.moveSnake(snakepts, numiter);
00390             // mark snake points on grid
00391             for (int k=0; k < snake.length; ++k){
00392                 grid.setValue(snake[k].getX(), snake[k].getY(), 1000);
00393             }
00394         }
00395         
00396         // write out original grid with snake points marked
00397         KmlWriter.write(grid, out, "snakes", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00398     }

Snake edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.SnakeActiveContour.pruneAndResample ( Snake  inputSnake  )  

00140                                                    {
00141         List<SnakeNode> nodes = new ArrayList<SnakeNode>(Arrays.asList(inputSnake.pts));
00142         int numNodes = nodes.size();
00143         if (numNodes <= 3) return inputSnake;
00144 
00145         
00146         int dist_thresh = SNAKE_DIST_BETWEEN_PTS * SNAKE_DIST_BETWEEN_PTS;
00147         for (int i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) {
00148             SnakeNode curPt = nodes.get(i);
00149             int next = i + 1; if (next == numNodes) next = 0;
00150             SnakeNode nextPt = nodes.get(next);
00151 
00152             int distsq = (nextPt.getX()-curPt.getX())*(nextPt.getX()-curPt.getX())+(nextPt.getX()-curPt.getX())*(nextPt.getY()-curPt.getY());
00153             boolean currNotOnGradient = gradient.getData()[curPt.getX()][curPt.getY()] < 30;
00154             boolean nextNotOnGradient = gradient.getData()[nextPt.getX()][nextPt.getY()] < 30;
00155             
00156             boolean remove = numNodes > SNAKE_LENGTH && ( (distsq < 20) || (distsq < 80 && nextNotOnGradient));
00157             if (remove) {
00158                 nodes.remove(next);
00159                 --numNodes;
00160                 --i; // retry this node
00161             } else if (distsq > dist_thresh && (currNotOnGradient || nextNotOnGradient)) {
00162                 SnakeNode newPt = new SnakeNode((curPt.getX()+nextPt.getX())/2,(curPt.getY()+nextPt.getY())/2);
00163                 nodes.add(i+1, newPt);
00164                 numNodes++;
00165             }
00166         }
00167         return new Snake(nodes.toArray(new SnakeNode[0]));
00168     }

Snake edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.SnakeActiveContour.resampleNodes ( Snake  inputSnake  )  

00170                                                 {
00171         SnakeNode[] full = complete(inputSnake.pts);
00172         if ( full.length <= SNAKE_LENGTH ) return inputSnake;
00173         System.out.println("Resampling " + full.length + " to " + SNAKE_LENGTH);
00174         int sampleInterval = full.length / SNAKE_LENGTH;
00175         SnakeNode[] sampled = new SnakeNode[SNAKE_LENGTH];
00176         for (int i=0; i < sampled.length; ++i){
00177             sampled[i] = full[i*sampleInterval];
00178         }
00179         return new Snake(sampled);
00180     }
